description: She announces it on Twitter; blames distance -- he lives an ocean away
text:
Sarah Silverman and Michael Sheen have broken up.
The 47 year old comic announced the split with the 49-year-old British actor on Twitter:
The great @michaelsheen & I consciously uncoupled over Christmas. I mean, not “over Christmas” - like that wasn’t the fight that ended it. No fight. We just live in different countries & it got hard. Felt we should just tell y’all so u stop askin, “How’s Michael/How’s Sarah?” — Sarah Silverman (@SarahKSilverman) February 5, 2018
They were first linked romantically in 2014 after they met on the set of Showtime's "Masters of Sex," notes aceshowbiz.com.
The British tabloid the Mirror says Silverman "borrowed the phrase Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin used to describe their split."
title: Sarah Silverman, Michael Sheen call it quits
